title: EventBridge
description: Master Amazon EventBridge - the serverless event bus that connects applications using events. Learn to build event-driven architectures with rules, patterns, scheduling, and integration with AWS services and SaaS applications.
objectives: Understand what events are and why they matter
Compare event-driven architecture vs direct integrations
Create and manage event buses and rules
Write effective event patterns for filtering
Integrate AWS services and SaaS applications
Use EventBridge Scheduler for time-based events
Implement EventBridge Pipes for point-to-point integration
Secure event buses with IAM and resource policies
